DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of single time point with dual time point PET imaging in the accuracy of diagnosing active lymphoma. Biopsy results or clinical/radiological progression will be used in conjunction with the PET data.
DOC.brief_title: Dual Time Point PET Imaging in Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Age 16 and above Diagnosis of Hodgkin's or NonHodgkin's lymphoma PET scan scheduled as part of management Pregnant or lactating Diabetes mellitus
